info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 28 at 4:44PM MDT by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Eagle County through 515 PM MDT... At 444 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles northeast of Carbondale, or 12 miles east of Glenwood Springs, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of southwestern Eagle County. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
